info.title: Purchasing Group - Read
info.description: This service enables you to read the purchasing groups in SAP S/4HANA Cloud from a source system outside SAP S/4HANA Cloud. It gets the details of the purchasing groups in the system, such as purchasing group ID and name.

x-sap-shortText: Read purchasing groups through an API call from a source system outside SAP S/4HANA Cloud
